channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 13th December
item.description:
Someone had dumped a big cardboard box and packaging near the entrance to the alley by dainton close/7 upper park road that leads to freelands road - it’s been there a few weeks now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Park Road, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Truck parked for a few weeks without tax hasn’t moved, 13th December

item.title: Lime bikes dumped outside the bay… again… lime unable to deal with, 13th December
item.description:
50 plus bikes dumped lime unable to deal with again. Disgraceful littering again. This needs to stop ruining this street. If they can’t support the bay then the bay needs to go. Horrible mess. Again and again and again. The council need to act as we all pay council tax and rates and this is not what we want. A shambles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlotte Road, Shoreditch, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked outside family home., 13th December
item.description:
Car has been parked outside our property for two days with both front windows open. No one has attended the car. The properties are 12 and 13 Thistlefield Close Bexley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Thistlefield Close, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned VW Fox - Car, 13th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bethune Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Lots of litter on street, 13th December
item.description:

item.title: Non council tenent fly tipping, 13th December
item.description:
I was coming into my block of flats and noticed a van stopping at every bin at every block and taking rubbish out there van, I could not get a photo as was too late to get my phone out but I managed to get there registration plate: GY25CXS FORD TRANSIT
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Restons Crescent, Avery Hill

item.title: Fly tipping of household waste, 13th December
item.description:

item.title: Fly tupping Maddocks Close, 13th December
item.description:

item.title: Potholes/ damaged road, 13th December
item.description:
